title: Will Netflix Buy Roku? Are You Ready for Antitrust Summer?  And More.
summary:
Kara and Scott sounds off about the rumors of a Netflix-Roku deal. Also, the Senate could vote on two antitrust bills this month. And Meta is delaying its rollout of AR glasses. Friend of Pivot, David Gelles to discuss his new book on Jack Welch, "The Man Who Broke Capitalism."You can find David’s book here.
Send us your Listener Mail questions by calling us at 855-51-PIVOT, or via Yappa at nymag.com/pivot.
